org.richfaces.webapp

Class GenericServletContainerInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.richfaces.webapp.GenericServletContainerInitializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.ServletContainerInitializer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PushServletContainerInitializer, ResourceServletContainerInitializer

    public abstract class GenericServletContainerInitializer
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.ServletContainerInitializer

    Provides common functionality for ServletContainerInitializer implementatios.

    Author:
    Lukas Fryc

      • hasFilterMapping

        protected boolean hasFilterMapping(Class<? extends javax.servlet.Filter> filterClass,
                       javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
        Detects if given Filter class has been already registered.
        Parameters:
        filterClass - Filter implementation class
        context - to search for registration
        Returns:
        true if given Filter class has been already registered.

      • getServletRegistration

        protected javax.servlet.ServletRegistration getServletRegistration(Class<? extends javax.servlet.Servlet> servletClass,
                                                       javax.servlet.ServletContext context)

        Returns the servlet registration for given Servlet class, which has at least one mapping registered.

        Returns null otherwise.

        Parameters:
        servletClass - Servlet implementation class
        context - to search for registration
        Returns:
        the servlet registration for given Servlet class, which has at least one mapping registered, null otherwise.
